item.title: Product Video for marketing - Upwork
item.description:
Need an audio and video marketing commercial for a new product launch. Product is a lockable Lunchbox called Arctic Kat. This product is designable to individuals liking and preference. (DIY) Design It Yourself. First color is a khaki , which can be designed for any organization with these colors, ex, NFL- New Orlean Saints, Army, Boy Scouts, Wake forrest University Etc...  The whole objective is to get the public engaged in creating their own personal lunchbox.  

Budget: $350
Posted On: June 17, 2024 02:24 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Video Commercial, Videography, Video Editing, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Video Production, Video Commercial, Videography, Video Editing, Marketing Strategy
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
